title: How to write 5.95 million of people, and how would you write that amount in dollars too - Quora

response.answer_text: Q: How do you write 5.95 million of people, and how would that amount in dollars too? A: I couldn't afford the postage to write to 5.95 million people. Okay, that was my shot at humor. 5.95 million people --> 5,950,000 people 5.95 million dollars --> $5,950,000.00

Thank you for asking about this. In figures, you would write 5,950,000 people and $5,950,000. In words, you would write five million, nine hundred and fifty thousand people and five million, nine hundred and fifty thousand dollars. All kind wishes, Barrie
